channel.title: X-Scape - VPS~WEBCLIENT~HIGHSCORES
channel.description:
X-Scape http://x-scape317.tk/
Motto: 100% Uptime 0% Downtime. ================================= Dear, Moparscape user I'm gladly allowed to announce the server X-Scape. Great ECO, 24/7[No downtime] 100% Uptime. Great Exp rates, Friendly players/Staff This server has a unique Donator Zone, with custom benefits ! Highscores and running on a VPS!
~Bosses~
Fully working Godwars King Black Dragon Dagganoth Bosses Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Icy Bones Bosses Balance Elemental Boss Sea Troll Queen Nomad Boss Bai'lak the Pummeller Boss Giant Mole Kalphite Queen Phoenix Lair Rammernauts Boss Arzinian Avatars Bosses Revenants Boss Ancient Warriors
~Skills~
All skills are working, even Construction with a custom Construction area !!
~Minigame's~
Barrow's Pest Controll TzHaar Cave Duel Arena Warrior's Guild
~
Level points, Every lvl that goes up gives you 1 level (LVL) point, every 99 skills gives a 15 point bonus ! With those points you are able to buy item's
Crystal key chest, If you get a Crystal Key in a drop (in parts) you will be able to get rare item's !
Watch this promo video to see more of this server !
Promo Video ! http://youtu.be/Z4KkRYCstto
=========Information====== Visit http://x-scape317.tk/ Webclient: http://x-scape317.tk/ Client DL: http://www.multiupload.nl/M7IYVQ7S0S
http://www.mediafire.com/?8d252micgjchm0r
http://up.ht/14jTmUI
More details will be available on our website.
